name: Light Consumed
description:
You are a Light Star, dont let the Shadow consume you.
Run faster, last longer!

Collect the Star Crystals to refill your Light Power!
If Star Crystals lose energy, they disappear! You have been warned!

How long can you survive before the Shadow consumes you?

MOVEMENT:

MoveMouse

Team:

Developer:PanosTrakProgrammer:PanosTrakArtist:PanosTrakGame Designer:PanosTrakMusic Producer:PanosTrak

Public Domain Assets used on this game:
https://www.dafont.com/potra.font

You can check the entire development process here: https://www.twitch.tv/panostrak/videos

This game was made in 15 hours for the Lux Jam!
The theme was Light and Shadow.
I wanted to make a simple casual  fast-paced replayable game
and i think i have achieved that!
